constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 97 (Friday, June 4, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SEAN PATRICK MALONEY of New York:
H.R. 3721.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Sec. 8
[Page H2693]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

title: To direct the Inspector General of the Department of Transportation to submit to Congress a report relating to any structural defects in the Governor Mario M. Cuomo Bridge, and for other purposes.
